content.en: Firefly Algorithm Enhancements: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the adaptability, performance, and efficiency of the Firefly Algorithm, a popular optimization tool. They have proposed various modifications and enhancements, such as the Adaptive Firefly Algorithm (AFA), Enhanced Firefly Algorithm (EFA), and Hybrid Firefly Algorithm (HFA), to address issues like local optima, oscillation, convergence speed, and computational complexity. These advancements aim to make the Firefly Algorithm more versatile and effective in solving a wide range of optimization problems.
content.da: Firefly-algoritme forbedringer: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre tilpasningsevnen, ydeevnen og effektiviteten af Firefly-algoritmen, et populært optimeringsværktøj. De har foreslået forskellige modificeringer og forbedringer, såsom den adaptive Firefly-algoritme (AFA), forbedret Firefly-algoritme (EFA) og hybrid Firefly-algoritme (HFA), for at håndtere problemer som lokale optima, oscillation, konvergenshastighed og beregningskompleksitet. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at gøre Firefly-algoritmen mere alsidig og effektiv i løsning af en bred vifte af optimeringsproblemer.
